definition: A term commonly employed to describe the extent or magnitude of an object, concept, or quality. It is often used to refer to the physical size or dimensions of something, as well as the scale or scope of a phenomenon. Additionally, it can be utilized to express the importance, significance, or rank of a person or thing within a particular context.

examples.german: Die Größe des Hauses beträgt 200 Quadratmeter.
examples.english: The size of the house is 200 square meters.

examples.german: Die Größe der Schuhe ist zu klein.
examples.english: The size of the shoes is too small.

examples.german: Die Größe des Bildschirms kann angepasst werden.
examples.english: The size of the screen can be adjusted.

examples.german: Die Größe des Pakets beträgt 10 Kilogramm.
examples.english: The size of the package is 10 kilograms.

examples.german: Die Größe des Teams hat sich verdoppelt.
examples.english: The size of the team has doubled.
